Select event activities are on a first-come, first-served basis. Event occurs rain or shine. No rain checks, returns or refunds. Prices, times, dates and entertainment are subject to change without notice. Additional restrictions may apply.

Children and non-swimmers should not be left unattended
All children 48\" and under are required to wear a US Coast Guard-approved flotation device
Want to buy something now but don’t want to carry it around all day?

Try complimentary Package Pick-Up at select merchandise locations within Universal Studios Florida® or Universal\'s Islands of Adventure® and your purchases will be sent to the front of the park to be picked up at your convenience.

All purchases are available to be picked up 3 hours after the time of purchase.

Purchases made in Universal Studios Florida may be picked up at It\'s A Wrap. Purchases made in Islands of Adventure may be picked up at Ocean Trader Market®.

If you are staying at Loews Portofino Bay Hotel, Hard Rock Hotel®, or Loews Royal Pacific Resort, your packages are delivered directly to your room. Packages are delivered to rooms the following day after 9 am. Guests staying at Universal\'s Cabana Bay Beach Resort may pick up their packages at the front desk the following day after 9 am.

Satisfy your thirst with one day of unlimited Coca-Cola freestyle® soft drinks at all participating Coca-Cola freestyle® locations. Valid at both Universal Studios Florida® and Universal\'s Islands of Adventure®.

A 1-Day Coca-Cola freestyle® Souvenir Cup is $12.99 per person + tax.

Purchase two cups for $11.99 each (per person + tax) or purchase three or more cups for $9.99 each (per person + tax).

Add a day for $6.99 at participating Coca-Cola freestyle® locations.

The Single Rider option is available for guests wishing to experience an attraction without friends or family in exchange for a shorter wait time. Single Rider is based on availability and subject to change without notice.
Ride too intense for little ones? One of you can wait with them while the rest of your group rides. Afterwards, the person who waited can ride without standing in line.

Skip the regular lines with the Universal Express<sup><small>SM</small></sup> pass! Maximize your fun and get through the line faster on your favorite participating rides and attractions.\n\nUniversal Express<sup><small>SM</small></sup> products are available for purchase pre-arrival at UniversalOrlando.com or in-park during your visit. (Valid theme park admission required. While supplies last.)

At Universal Orlando® Resort, we know it can be a challenge to dine out when you or someone you’re with has food allergies and/or intolerances. That’s why we offer a number of dining locations throughout Universal’s Islands of Adventure®, Universal Studios Florida®, Universal CityWalk® and our on-site hotels where our chefs and culinary staff can accommodate your dietary needs related to common food allergies, phenylketonuria (PKU), metabolic disorders, and guests with multiple allergies/intolerances.

Guests with questions about the dietary requests listed above and questions not answered here can contact us. Please call at least 14 days in advance. Our dining locations will do their best to accommodate guests with food allergies, but cannot guarantee that they will be able to meet all requests.

If you aren’t able to research dining options ahead of time, don’t worry. You can ask to speak to a chef or manager at any restaurant within Universal Orlando® Resort once you’re here. Let them know which guest in your party has a food allergy or intolerance, and what the allergy/intolerance is. Our culinary staff will make every effort to prevent that allergen from coming in contact with any part of that guest’s meal.

Paid theme park admission required. Limit one (1) express ride access entry per participating attractions using the Universal Express℠ queue. Not valid at Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey™, Harry Potter and the Escape from Gringotts™, and other select attractions. Universal Express℠ passes not valid at Hogwarts™ Express and available during normal theme park operating hours only. Not valid for separately ticketed special events or at Wet ‘n Wild. Additional restrictions may apply and benefits are subject to change without notice.\n\nFor full details, please visit UniversalOrlando.com or visit one of the in-park purchase locations.
Tap a show time to set a reminder
Times vary, visit location or see Guest Services for details
Open seasonally, visit location or see Guest Services for details
As an on-site hotel guest, you can enjoy Early Park Admission to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ one hour before the theme park opens (valid theme park admission required). Restrictions apply.
As a guest of the hotel, you\'ll skip the regular lines at select attractions in both theme parks all day - a free benefit worth up to $89 per person. Valid theme park admission is required.
Visit locker location for pricing information

Universal Studios® and Universal's Islands of Adventure® are open 365 days a year. Operating hours normally begin at 9:00 a.m. and closing times vary.

After a day at the theme parks, head to Universal CityWalk® where you can relax, unwind and enjoy great food, cold drinks and live music! Universal CityWalk operating hours are from 11:00 a.m. to 2:00 a.m., 365 days a year.

Please note: Park Hours are subject to change.

Thank you for visiting Universal Orlando Resort®! Your experiences at our resort are extremely important to us. If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, please call us for immediate assistance. Guest Services Coordinators are available seven days a week, from 8:30 AM until our theme parks close, to assist you.\n\nOr, e-mail us below. We make every effort to respond to emails within 24 to 48 hours; however, due to the high volume of emails we receive each day, please allow several days for a response to your email.
Ride too intense for little ones? One of you can wait with them while the rest of your group rides. Afterwards, the person who waited can ride without standing in line.

Complimentary XFINITY WiFi is now available throughout Universal Studios Florida, Universal\'s Islands of Adventure and Universal CityWalk. It\'s easy to get connected and can help save cellular data.

Complimentary xfinity WiFi is now available throughout Universal Studios Florida, Universal\'s Islands of Adventure and Universal CityWalk. It\'s easy to get connected and can help save cellular data.
Follow the prompts to sign in
We couldn\'t load your page please try again
Unable to load content. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Where do I pick up my theme park tickets?

You may pick up tickets at the Will Call Kiosk, where you will swipe the credit card used during purchase (for verification purposes only), enter the Reservation Number provided on this email receipt, and your tickets will print automatically. Your reservation number contains only the number 0 (zero) and never the letter O when entering it at the kiosk.\n\nFlorida Resident and/or Blue Man Group tickets must be picked up at a Pass Sales Booth at the front of either park by presenting your reservation number and a valid photo ID.
Where do I retrieve my reservation voucher?

Reservations included in your vacation package are included in your E-Travel Document. You must print a copy of the voucher within the E-Travel Document and present it for redemption, along with a valid Photo ID.
What time can I enter the park with Early Park Admission?
Early Park Admission begins one hour before the scheduled park opening. Be sure to bring your admission tickets and e-travel documents with you.
Is there FREE transportation from my hotel to the theme parks?

Scheduled theme park transportation provided is based on regular park operating hours* (does not run continuously) to UNIVERSAL ORLANDO® theme parks. Seating/standing space is limited and on a first come, first served basis. *Not valid for Special Events, Groups or Early Park Admission.
How do I book the UPRV Early Park Admission shuttle?

Guests wishing to take advantage of the Early Park Admission departures must call the UPRV Early Park Admission shuttle reservation line at 800-711-0080, between the hours of 8:00am and 8:00pm no later than one day prior to the day they wish to use Early Park Admission. This special charter service books by reservation ONLY, boarding passes will NOT be issued. Limited hotel participation available.
What if the scheduled theme park transportation is late?

Traffic delays of 15 to 20 minutes around the International Drive corridor and the Theme Parks are to be expected. If the transportation is delayed later than 20 minutes, please visit the hotel Front Desk or the Attraction Ticket Center located in the hotel lobby.
I’m staying at an On-Site Deluxe hotel. How do I receive my Unlimited Express Pass?

This theme park privilege is valid from park opening on the day of your check-in through park closing on your check-out day. If you arrive at our resort prior to check-in time, your hotel will check your bags and issue temporary room keys so that you can start enjoying your express access. On your check-out day, your room keys will be deactivated for hotel use, but you can continue to use your unlimited Express Pass through park closing. Please be advised that express access is only valid at participating attractions. Lastly, please note that these privileges do not apply to separately-ticketed special events such as Rock the Universe® and Halloween Horror Nights®.\n\nAt the express kiosks, you will be prompted to insert your room key card and follow the on screen instructions to print your Unlimited Express Pass. The kiosk will take a photo of you to print on the Express Pass. Show this pass at each express attraction entrance for free access throughout both theme parks. If you ever lose this Express Pass, please visit any of our Guest Services locations for assistance.
What number can I call for assistance with my vacation package?
You can reach one of our agents Monday – Saturday, 7:30am - 10:00pm and Sunday, 7:30am – 9:00pm by calling 800.407.4275
Are you sure you want to discard your parking reminder?
As you explore Universal Orlando Resort, you can use the side drawer to explore the theme parks and properties.
Whenever you need it, you can view a map of Universal Orlando Resort to find rides, shows, dining, and other points of interest throughout the parks.
As you explore, each attraction has a section where you can find helpful information like a description, height and accessibility details, and its location.
View ride wait times and show times for all your favorite attractions!
While you explore the parks, navigate with walking directions to all attractions by tapping the Guide Me button.
You can use the wait time reminder to alert you when your favorite attractions have shorter wait times.

Welcome to Universal Orlando® Resort. Now that you\'re here, you can utilize walking directions to find your way throughout the parks. And don\'t forget you can always access today\'s wait times and show times to help plan your day.
Skip the regular lines with Universal Express Pass! See where to buy your pass.
Set an alert from any ride or show\'s detail page
Wait time and ride opening alerts can only be created, edited, and delivered while inside the Universal Orlando Resort. However, they can be deleted at any time.
Alerts are removed each night after the parks close. Please set new alerts each day you visit the Universal Orlando Resort.

Eat at many of the most popular dining locations in both theme parks and Universal CityWalk®, over one hundred locations in all!
Meals at Universal Orlando® are fun and easy with a Universal Dining Plan.\n\nOnly available with your Universal Orlando Resort Vacation Package.

Make food part of the fun. Save 30% on select entree, snack and beverage combinations with a Universal Dining Plan - Quick Service.\n\nDining Plan - Quick Service is available for purchase pre-arrival at UniversalOrlando.com or in-park during your visit.
